subject: Missing Persons
Football
lead_paragraph: The 21-year-old son of the offensive coordinator Joe Philbin was missing Monday, the same day that a body was recovered from a river in Oshkosh, where he was last seen.
snippet: The 21-year-old son of the offensive coordinator Joe Philbin was missing Monday, the same day that a body was recovered from a river in Oshkosh, where he was last seen.
